articles.author: Erik Kain
articles.title: 'The Boys' Crossed A Line, And It Wasn't 'Hilarious' At All - Forbes
articles.description: 'The Boys' doesn't even bother to grapple with male victims of sexual assault as showrunner Eric Kripke writes it off as 'hilarious'.
